name: kill switch (itch) (tentabulge games)
description:
It appears that your self-defense systems are malfunctioning!  You are presently a danger to your surroundings!  Quickly find the emergency switch to disable your systems before you cause too much damage...

From the creators:

Yes... it is a work in progress... 

Credits

Art by YiNa Wang (https://yinadesu.com/)

Controls

Arrow keys: movement, jump, select menu options

X: hold X to maintain direction of fire while running and jumping; changing direction of movement won't affect your aim direction

Z: also jump

Enter: confirm

Escape: pause game
